Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.support

Class Score

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.support.Score
public class Score extends Object
Score uses the singleton pattern and cannot be inherited. Score defines methods for score. Each person's highest score is displayed on the board
Author:
YuyanZhou
